name: 3D FPS (Aridizan)
description:
Proposed modifications:

I will create a complete coherent level by adding more enemies and platforming with a more interesting layout on level1.

I will create custom music for my game.

I will also modify enemy behavior to be unique by increasing speed of some enemies as well as the way the fire and their damage tables.
